title: Islam is the Only Non-Christian Faith which Makes it an Article of Faith to Believe in Jesus Christ
transcript: Islam is the only non-Christian Faith which makes it an Article of Faith to believe in Jesus Christ peace be upon him no muslim is a Muslim if he does not believe in Jesus Christ peace be upon him we believe that he was one of the mightiest messengers of Allah subhana wa ta'ala of almighty God we believe that he was the Christ translated as Messi we believe that he was born miraculously with without any male Intervention which many modern day Christians today do not believe we believe that he gave life to the Dead with God's permission we believe that he healed those born blind and lepers with God's permission by name there are 25 Messengers given in the Glorious Quran but it's also mentioned inaha chapter number four verse number 164 and Sur chapter number 40 verse number 78 that we narrate to you the stories of some of the messengers of the others we don't that means the story of only some of the messengers are mentioned in the Glorious Quran
